title: "Hurricane Landfall Visualization Redesign"

## Project Overview

This project redesigns NOAA's International Atlantic Hurricane Landfalls data table (1946-2023) to demonstrate effective data visualization principles for STAT 515.

![Temporal Trends](redesign1_temporal.png){width="90%"}

### Project Components

-   **Original Visualization**: NOAA hurricane landfall data table
-   **4 Redesigns**: Temporal, spatial, categorical, and relational analyses
-   **Tools**: R, ggplot2, Quarto
-   **Course**: STAT 515 - Applied Statistics and Visualization for Analytics
